name: The Interactive Album - Cullen Vance
description:
Make Music with 28 musical elements in your control.

Each element harmonizes and times perfectly with every other element in its own unique way. 

Speed up, slow down, reverse, randomize, save your favorites, or put on "Autopilot" mode for hours of self-evolving soundscapes.

For PC and MAC

Reactions from Beta Testers:  
“A game changer” 
“GENIUS” 
“Nothing short of a magical experience” 
“Brilliant!” 
“The sheer joy of play” 
“This is sooooooo cooooooool!!!!” 
“truly incredible”
  “so much variety and versatility”
“In just a few minutes I can already feel my blood pressure dropping.”

       

This project was made possible in part by a grant from Lane Arts Council and support from City of Eugene Cultural Services, Banner Bank, and individual donors.
